official_title: To provide for the establishment by the Secretary of Energy of a program of Federal support for local governments and school districts to implement clean energy projects.
subjects: Cogeneration of electric power and heat

summary.text: Clean Energy Partnership Act of 2007 - Directs the Secretary of Energy to provide grants to local educational agencies covering up to 50% of their costs in implementing clean energy projects that include measures to conserve energy and equip school buildings for renewable power sources.

titles.title: To provide for the establishment by the Secretary of Energy of a program of Federal support for local governments and school districts to implement clean energy projects.
